recommendations: LinkedIn User “Joslin is a very hardworking and sincere. In the two years in NCDEX eMarkets, she consistently exceeded the expectation. Its the combination of communication skill and business acumen which makes her an outstanding sales person. Joslin's documentation skill is exceptional and some of the reports prepared by her are still benchmark for other team members in the organization. I wish her all the best in her future endeavors!”
